description.narrative: Deliberate effort to send two (2) women for Leadership for change course to enhance their leadership skills in line with the project focus. Established coffee and tree nurseries to enhance coffee production with 9915 SL coffee seedlings, 2204 grevillea and 2200 macadamia. Engagement of the County Government on debt waiver and farm input supply of KES 500 million and the petition is at the Machakos county assembly. Enhanced advocacy activities particularly to the County Government of Machakos which has resulted to recognition of the cooperative sector by being incorporated into the Budget and Economic Forum and the Chair MCU appointed to represent the interests of the Cooperatives in the committee and the county in general.

The goal is to improve farm productivity and incomes by enhancing the participation of women and young people in agricultural production. The project aims to strengthen the union and affiliates to be able to practice gender equality and offer demand driven services; scale-up advocacy and engagement of the duty bearers to develop & review legislation and policies to become gender sensitive; improve agricultural productivity and food security for increased incomes; improve the farmers capacity to adapt to climate change and increase environmental sustainability; increase participation of women and young people in leadership and decision-making; increase women participation in productive social-economic activities; increase access to affordable financial services for women, young people and men members and increase access to micro-insurance products and services by the farmers.

activity-date.narrative: Planned end date of the activity
Planned start date of the activity
